entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Courtenay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:51 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 02:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: SSE 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 9:01 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 9:01 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 9:01 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
